scripts.generate:ticket:client: shx rm -rf dist/ticket/typescript-fetch && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -i ../nestjs-validated-openapi/src/openapi.yaml -o dist/ticket/typescript-fetch
scripts.generate:ticket:server: shx rm -rf dist/ticket/php-symfony && openapi-generator-cli generate -g php-symfony -i ../nestjs-validated-openapi/src/openapi.yaml -o dist/ticket/php-symfony
